SEARCH
Package burp.api.montoya.utilities

Interface CompressionUtils

public interface CompressionUtils
This interface gives you access to data compression features.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ByteArray
    compress(ByteArray data, CompressionType type)
    Compress data using the specified compression type.
    ByteArray
    decompress(ByteArray compressedData, CompressionType type)
    Decompress data compressed using the specified compression type.

  • Method Details

    • compress

      ByteArray compress(ByteArray data, CompressionType type)
      Compress data using the specified compression type.
      Parameters:
      data - data to be compressed
      type - CompressionType to use. Only GZIP is supported
      Returns:
      compressed data

    • decompress

      ByteArray decompress(ByteArray compressedData, CompressionType type)
      Decompress data compressed using the specified compression type.
      Parameters:
      compressedData - data to be decompressed
      type - CompressionType of the compressed data
      Returns:
      decompressed data
